name: EscapeCalendar
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: It may be a TV show on Tuesday evening, a first date on Friday, a sporting event, concert this weekend or an upcoming vacation destination. Escape Calendar is your daily reminder on where and how to escape!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
